name: Reflect (Broken Elf Studios)
description:
Reflect is a simple puzzle game. Guide the lasers into the recievers but strategically placing and rotating mirrors on the grid.

Download Instrustions:

  1. Download the zip file Refect.Zip
  2. Extract the files
  3. Open the "Diving Squid Jam" Application

 This game was made for the Diving Squid Game Jam. Thank you to the diving squid community for making the jam incredibly enjoyable. 

There is a bug where the lasers dont fire at the start of the level sometimes. Just place a mirror to fire them. Sorry that I couldn't find a fix before the jam's deadline.

Press Escape to exit game.
